scenario_text.value:
(For me, it’s only been a few days since we
came here...)

(But for Aoi and the rest, it’s been much
longer...)

What’re you doing in a place like this? And
all alone, even.
Ah, no real reason. I just felt like walking.

The fog spreads through here more often than
it did before.

(Hm... I’m not sure what it is, but Aoi seems
different.)

You look like you’ve seen something weird...
Is everything all right?

Oh, no... It’s nothing. Just, I was thinking
that it’s a shame, you know?

With the fog making this area dangerous,
I can’t use it as a place to talk to you.

Oh, um! I didn’t mean that in a weird way,
honest!
Not at all. I felt the same way, actually.
